comment: Never has so little effort meant so much to so many. I rarely tweet but noticed you and others shine a positive light on the vaccination efforts and I thought I would try add more momentum. Be well.
amr:
# ::snt Never has so little effort meant so much to so many. I rarely tweet but noticed you and others shine a positive light on the vaccination efforts and I thought I would try add more momentum. Be well.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / mean-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (e / effort-01
                  :quant (l / little
                        :mod (s / so)))
            :ARG2 (e2 / effort-01
                  :quant (m3 / many
                        :mod (s2 / so)))
            :time (e3 / ever))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (t / tweet-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1-of (r / rare-02))
            :ARG2 (n / notice-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (s3 / shine-01
                        :ARG0 (a / and
                              :op1 (y / you)
                              :op2 (o / other))
                        :ARG1 (l2 / light
                              :mod (p / positive))
                        :ARG2 (e4 / effort-01
                              :ARG1 (v / vaccinate-01))))
            :ARG2 (t2 / think-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (t3 / try-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (a2 / add-02
                              :ARG0 ii
                              :ARG1 (m4 / momentum
                                    :mod (m5 / more))))))
      :snt3 (w / well-09
            :mode imperative
            :ARG1 y))

comment: Well done. My nd Moderna due next week. Onwards and upwards.
amr:
# ::snt Well done. My nd Moderna due next week. Onwards and upwards.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / do-02
            :ARG1-of (w / well-09))
      :snt2 (d2 / due-03
            :ARG1 (d3 / degree
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Moderna")
                  :poss (ii / i))
            :time (w2 / week
                  :mod (n2 / next)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (u / upward)
            :op2 u))
